annotations.description: An Node.js frontend application for visualizing the Catalog of Products. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/nodejs-ex/blob/master/README.md.
annotations.openshift.io/long-description: This template defines resources needed to develop the React with NodeJS application, including a build configuration and application deployment configuration.

message:
The following service(s) have been created in your project: ${NAME}.

For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/nodejs-ex/blob/master/README.md.

annotations.description: Keeps track of changes in the application image
Defines how to build the application

parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the frontend objects defined in this template.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_URL
parameters.description: The URL of the repository with your application source code.

parameters.name: SOURCE_REPOSITORY_REF
parameters.description: Set this to a branch name, tag or other ref of your repository if you are not using the default branch.

parameters.name: SOURCE_USERNAME
parameters.description: Username that will be used for accessing the git repository.

parameters.name: CONTEXT_DIR
parameters.description: Set this to the relative path to your project if it is not in the root of your repository.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_SERVICE
parameters.description: The exposed service that will be contacted by the frontend application
